page.title: 15PETS
page.content:
{ Pets are animals that we enjoy {keeping.} There are many reasons why we keep pets. Pets like cats and dogs can keep us company. Some people say that it is good for us to keep pets because stroking them can keep us calm. Although keeping pets can mean a lot of work for us, we enjoy looking after them. We keep some colourful or unusual pets, such as fish, just to look at.{ {WORKING PETS}(pets that are kept to do work for us, usually dogs). {Guard dogs}protect our homes. {Sheep dogs}help the farmer to look after sheep.{Guide dogs}guide blind people around places.{Police dogs}help the police track down criminals.
I have a cat and a dog. My friend has 5 dogs and 5 cats.
